<color=#ece5d8>Wangshan Hall</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff>Enter the Arcane Archive</color>
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color>
Also, the whole treasure thing still turned out to be a hoax in the end! Ugh, Paimon's really mad now! Just you wait, She's going to find something super valuable to take away from this place today!
Ugh, it's completely rusted... It's next to impossible to get this thing open!
<color=#ece5d8>Arcane Archive</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff>Search the Arcane Archive</color>
Read "Guhua Notes"
<color=#ffffff>"Guhua Notes":</color>
"...Practicing the Light Piercer technique. Destroyed all the dummies by mistake... No money or resources... I've got an idea. I'll tie straws together to make my own..."
"Gathering straw."
"Tying straw. Exhausting."
"...Practicing the Light Piercer technique. Destroyed all the dummies by mistake... I might as well train with the sword first."
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>Continue reading.</color>
<color=#ffffff>"Guhua Notes":</color>
"...Bored. As I sat before the courtyard, I felt slightly hungry... I pondered on what I saw the other day, and I suddenly felt enlightened. If I use the sword... (indiscernible) I'll call it Rain Cutter. I'll try it another day."
"...I accidentally fell while practicing Rain Cutter. Luckily, it's nothing serious... I thought of an idea. Why not dig a deep pond below the piles? Not only will it prevent injuries from falls, but I can raise fish for food..."
"...I went to a fisherman and bought dozens of fish... I tried cooking them. Their deliciousness was unrivaled..."
(The next ten or so pages are dedicated to detailed records of cooking methods for fish, and some are even paired with illustrations.)
"...Accidentally fell while practicing Rain Cutter."
"...Success."
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>Continue reading.</color>
<color=#ffffff>"Guhua Notes":</color>
"...The spear and sword must be wielded with the same mastery as... (Indiscernible. There is a comment from the 3rd Master beside it: second nature.) ... And that, is the truth... Yet there is none... How shall it be granted? How shall it be revealed?"
"...Renovate the library. Design... within, and..."
"...Look with the eyes, and combine scrolls of knowledge from all places with chambers of all corners, then..."
(The next few pages are smudged and unintelligible. There is a comment from the 3rd Master at the side: This advises future generations to read extensively.)
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>Continue reading.</color>
<color=#ffffff>"Guhua Notes":</color>
"...Recovered from injury. The little Bai kid visited with mutton and fish. Plump, delicious, and without any pungent smells. I asked for the recipe... Passed down the Life Ender technique... Recorded here."
(The following pages contain detailed records of various methods of cooking mutton.)
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>I've had enough. It's such a mess...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>I've had enough. The training process isn't recorded at all...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Traveler:</color> <color=#ffffff>I've had enough of this nonsense...</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff>Find the secret stashed in the Arcane Archive</color>
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color>
Oh, there was also a line in that book just now that really bothered Paimon...
It said something along the lines of "Observe it with your eyes." Could it be trying to say that we should use Elemental Sight?
<color=#ffffff>Quest Objective:</color> <color=#ffffff>Activate the mechanism</color>
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color>
Whoa, the water level's dropping!
Did we... Did we actually find the Guhua Clan's treasure after all? Traveler, let's go take a look!
